CustomField.formula:
IF( ISNULL(EBH_InitialCallDate__c), NULL,
IF( AND( ISNULL( EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c ), ISNULL( EBH_AcceptedTC__c )), TODAY() - EBH_InitialCallDate__c,
IF( ISNULL(EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c), EBH_AcceptedTC__c - EBH_InitialCallDate__c,
IF( ISNULL( EBH_AcceptedTC__c ), EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c - EBH_InitialCallDate__c,
IF( EBH_AcceptedTC__c > EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c, EBH_ThirdPartyProviderDate__c - EBH_InitialCallDate__c,
EBH_AcceptedTC__c - EBH_InitialCallDate__c
)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of Days that seller spent in the Acquisition stage (starting from the date when a seller got the first call to the date when he selected 3PP in Shutl or Accepted T&Cs)
CustomField.label: Days in Acquisition
